title: building with various external NCCL configurations is entirely untested in CI
body_html:
We should make test environments with the configurations that we care about, and test them regularly (though potentially not triggered on every single PR).

An example of code we have that can break without test signal is https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/setup_helpers/nccl.py#L57-L69
body_text:

We should make test environments with the configurations that we care about, and test them regularly (though potentially not triggered on every single PR).

An example of code we have that can break without test signal is https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/setup_helpers/nccl.py#L57-L69
